comments: I have had this prof at Parsons for multiple semesters. She is one of the most amazing lecturers ever. She is so interesting and current - she will wow you with her class and you will learn so much useful stuff. The work load is a group thing. She definately made a diffence - one of the best professors I ever had - here or Spain!!

Amazing Professor! She is really cool, funky and interesting! she always brings in fun ads to share with the class! really up to date with whats going on in the fashion world! you gatta take her classes! great dresser too! your ganna want to come to class just to see what shes ganna wear! I know she usually teaches ecommerce and market research.
Hugely interesting class, very interactive class, great new learning, never boring.
Amazingggg professor!!!! You better jump at the chance to take a class with her! TRUST ME it\'ll be the best time you\'ve ever had in class!!!!!
She likes to bring interesting materials to class and talk about it. Stylish and funny. She is savvy about marketing and advertising. It was interesting to listen to her analysis of buying.

TAKE THIS CLASS.. shes awesome .. young, stylish and down to earth my partner screwed me with my project.. i did like 90% myself i called her and she totally understood and was so nice about it all u have to do is the work she asks u to do which isnt a lot .. TAKE HER I PROMISE YOULL B GLAD U DID!

She is absolutely histerical. I had her for a 6:30pm class and didn\'t even mind going. She makes the whole class crack up. Light workload but you definitely understand the material taught. shes a little wacky but great personality-LOVED her!
